title: Make the Most of Your Morning
detail_text: <:th_ch0101/>Zzz....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Ah, I knew it. You’re still asleep.... I guess it can’t be helped....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Hnzzz~....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Chika-chan, it’s the morning! Wake up~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Hyaaah!? I-, I’m up. I just had my eyes closed! Shima-nee, I’m really.... Huh?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Fufu, it was me~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Riko-chan!? You reaaally surprised me!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>We’re going to start doing early morning marathons from today, right? Come on, wake up.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Alright. Aaah~, my hair is all messed up~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Geez, I’ll fix it while you get dressed. So come on, hurry up and change~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
